datum: You will set princes over all the earth.
They will remember your name Lord.
Peter the Apostle, * and Paul the Teacher of the Nations, these have taught us your law Lord.

God, whose right hand lifted up blessed Peter, lest he should fall walking on the flood, and freed his co-apostle Paul who was thrice shipwrecked from the depth of the flood: + hear us favorably, and grant; * that by the eternal merits of both we should obtain glory.
